entry.div:
Cleaning closed
molds
One needs to let them cool rather than blow inside to clean them, for when hot, they retain the
ash
. When cold, they are cleaned better. Take a
thin wire of latten
or a
delicate straw
to clean the tail completely, for this is what makes the gate. Blow into it & suck, drawing it to you. Before molding, thicken the tail with
wax
, then cut it,
